Performance is the key to career growth! Discuss in detail the impact of training and development on employee job performance.

 

 

              Employees play a major role in the growth and development of the Company. Company should provide the Training and Development programmes to both the freshers and the employees who are working in it. For freshers the Training programmes should be conducted to understand the process of work at the company. For the employees in the company requires Development Programmes to enhance their skills and to know about the changes in the work or for the improvement in their work.

              Training and Development helps the employee expose to the new methods and concepts/changes in the work. These programmes benefits to both company and employees to work in a smart way & to improve their career in the Company.

              Training and development programmes impacts the employee in a positive manner or negative manner. If the impact is in positive manner, employee improves his/her level of work. If the impact is in negative manner, reasons should be known and rectify them. Finally, employees should improve their performance in the process of work for their career growth.
